General.Name: National Company for Learning and Education SJSC
General.Description: National Company for Learning and Education owns, establishes, manages, and operates kindergarten, primary, intermediate, and secondary schools in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates nine educational complexes using the Saudi national curriculum, as well as American international curriculum under the Tarbya Namouthajiya Schools brand. It also invests in sports, entertainment, and sports clubs for students. The company was formerly known as Tarniyah Namouthajiyah Schools Company and changed its name to National Company for Learning and Education in 2004. National Company for Learning and Education was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1.Name: Abdullah  bin Ahmed Balsharaf
1.Title: Deputy CEO for Admin. and Fin.
